hero.title: Samu sauƙi a kowane hulɗa
hero.subtitle: Muna gina kayan aikin AI, tsarin sarrafa aiki, da aikace-aikacen zamani waɗanda ke sauƙaƙe aikin ku, rage ƙoƙarin hannu, kuma suna taimaka wa kasuwancin ku ya ci gaba da sauri.

services.heading: Abin Da Muke Yi
services.subtitle: Cikakkun hanyoyin fasaha da aka keɓance ga bukatun kasuwancin ku

service1.title: Tsarin AI da Sarrafa Aiki
service1.description: Tsarin hankali da ke sarrafa ayyuka masu maimaitawa kuma yana ba da bayani daga bayananku.

service2.title: Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizo Na Musamman
service2.description: Aikace-aikacen yanar gizo masu faɗaɗa waɗanda aka gina da React, Django, FastAPI, da fasahohin zamani.

service3.title: Haɗin API
service3.description: Haɗin kai mara matsala tsakanin kayan aikin ku da ayyuka don ingantaccen tsarin aiki.

service4.title: Hanyoyin Biyan Kuɗi
service4.description: Sarrafa biyan kuɗi mai tsaro tare da tallafi ga ƙofofin Afirka da na duniya.

service5.title: Ƙarin Ƙungiya
service5.description: Ƙwararrun masu haɓakawa don faɗaɗa ƙungiyar ku kuma ku hanzarta isar da aikin.

service6.title: Horarwa da Shawarwari
service6.description: Horarwar fasaha da shawarwarin dabara don AI, sarrafa aiki, da ci gaban yanar gizo.

about.heading: Gina Hanyoyin Fasaha Waɗanda Ke Ci Gaba
about.paragraph1: Sannex yana ƙware a sarrafa aiki da AI ke tallafawa, aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na musamman, da haɗin kai mara matsala waɗanda ke taimaka wa kasuwanci su yi aiki yadda ya kamata.
about.paragraph2: Da tushe a Lagos, Najeriya, muna aiki da majami'u, jami'o'i, masu farawa, da kamfanoni a duk faɗin Afirka da duniya, muna ba da hanyoyin da ke haɗa cancantar fasaha da ƙimar kasuwanci mai amfani.
about.highlight1: Ƙwarewa a hanyoyin AI da Sarrafa Aiki
about.highlight2: Ƙwarewar Fullstack tare da React, Django, FastAPI
about.highlight3: Gogewa tare da abokan ciniki na Afirka da duniya
about.highlight4: Mayar da hankali kan hanyoyin da suka dace, masu ci gaba

cta.heading: Kuna da aikin a zuciya?
cta.subtitle: Bari mu tattauna yadda za mu iya taimaka muku gina hanyoyin AI, sarrafa ayyukan, ko haɓaka aikace-aikace na musamman waɗanda ke inganta kasuwancin ku.

footer.description: Muna gina kayan aikin AI, tsarin sarrafa aiki, da aikace-aikacen zamani waɗanda ke sauƙaƙe aikin ku, rage ƙoƙarin hannu, kuma suna taimaka wa kasuwancin ku ya ci gaba da sauri.
footer.copyright: Sannex Technologies. Duk haƙƙoƙi an kiyaye su.

aboutPage.title: Wane ne Mu
aboutPage.subtitle: Gina tsarin hankali da ke canza yadda kasuwanci ke aiki
aboutPage.storyP1: An kafa Sannex tare da manufa mai tsayi: don sauƙaƙa fasaha mai ciki da kuma amfani ga kasuwancin Afirka. Muna zaune a Lagos, Najeriya, muna ƙware a cikin sarrafa aiki da AI ke tallafawa, ci gaban yanar gizo na musamman, da haɗin tsarin da babu matsala.
aboutPage.storyP2: Mun yi aiki da majami'u don sarrafa ayyukansu, jami'o'i don gina tsarin gudanarwa, masu farawa don ƙaddamar da dandamalin biyan kuɗi, da kamfanoni don inganta ayyukansu. Kowane aikin yana koya mana sabon abu, kuma muna kawo wannan ilimin zuwa ƙalubalen gaba.
aboutPage.storyP3: Hanyar mu ta haɗa cancantar fasaha da tunanin kasuwanci mai amfani. Ba kawai muna gina software ba—muna gina hanyoyin da ke ci gaba, tsarin da ke dawwama, da haɗin gwiwar da ke girma.
aboutPage.value1Desc: Muna gina fasaha da ke magance matsaloli na gaske kuma yana haifar da ƙima mai auna ga abokan cinikinmu.
aboutPage.value2Desc: Muna gaba da hanyoyin fasaha, muna kawo AI da sarrafa aiki mafi girma ga kowane aikin.
aboutPage.value3Desc: Muna aiki a matsayin ƙarin ƙungiyar ku, muna tabbatar da cewa mafita sun dace da manufofin kasuwancin ku.
aboutPage.readySubtitle: Ko kuna buƙatar sarrafa aiki na AI, aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na musamman, ko shawarwarin fasaha, muna nan don taimaka muku gina babban abu.
